author: YamiKaitou#8975
name: PayDay
description: Give bonus credits for daily and other times
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store end user data. This cog does store Discord UserIDs as needed for operation.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the cog. I'm in the Cog Support server if you need help with anything. Make sure you take a look under `[p]pdconfig` before getting started, all commands are turned off by default
